title: Day Enugwu Ukwu community dealt unemployment upppercut | Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News
text:
tweet 
THERE are a few members in the National Assembly who have genuine reasons to be in the Assemblies to serve their people. They see politics as a call to national service. One such public spirited politician is Hon. Ferdinand Dozie Nwankwo who represents Anaocha, Njikoka and Dunukofia Federal Constituency in the House of Representatives. 
In the past six years, his name has become a household name in Anambra State. He has experienced the various twists and turns in his political career, winning every election contested but denied his hard won victory through machinations and intrigues. It was same experience in the 2015 General elections where, though he won convincingly, defeating his opponents in every polling boot with very wide margins on votes, but his opponent was declared winner. It was only through the instrumentality of Almighty God that the Elections Petition Tribunal gaveâ€¦
